title: Post a Patient Payment
description: A front desk staff member collects a copay from a patient at check-in and needs to post the payment.

tasks.description: Identify the patient's account and their outstanding balance or expected copay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the patient's account and sees the copay amount.

tasks.description: Take the payment from the patient via credit card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the credit card transaction.

tasks.description: Post the payment to the patient's account, applying it to their copay balance for the current visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The payment is successfully posted, and the patient's balance is reduced.
